website_summaries.verdict: Though a bit bulky to store and transport, this is a great item for parents on a budget looking for an indoor and outdoor playpen.
pros: Great for indoor or outdoor use and offers a large play area
Easy to set up and take down
cons: Bulky for storage, but that is to be expected in a unit that provides a 14-square-foot play area

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. No need to buy the canopy just flip it over.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great value, versatile and EASY to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Great! I used foam tiles and cut them to fit, for indoor use. Beats spending $120 for a roomy play yard!
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Portable and useful!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! For small apartments where we live in Taipei, it's the perfect size to squeeze in and portable enough to carry back and forth between home and grandparents. Loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cheng

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Bought to give 10 month old a place to stretch in hotel rooms. It was so handy - way easier than a pack and play. Love that it is also easier to spray down assuming the floor is really dirty. I got sick and was able to lay in it with him so I could rest and he could crawl all over me. I would never lay down on a hotel room floor, but could with this. Worth every penny! My only complaint and suggestion. We also bought the full cover to use it outside. It would be nice if the storage bag were actually big enough to store both items...
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming477475858483

customer_reviews.title: Not easy clean
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this my son hates being in it. It is very useful however if I go somewhere or do something I need him to be confined lol or how my parents say it baby jail. But I went to a ranch with my family and just some dirt not wet or anything and it just stuck to the fabric. I rinsed it with a hose and it still looks dirty. The green fabric can not be taken off and cleaned. If it can it’s complicated and not worth it. The annoying part on set up is you have to pull the end of every pole with a strap to latch it on so it stays up. Tedious work.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: ZERO STARS! We own a 4 moms packnplay (very expensive and great quality). I purchased his summer infant pop n play for a snowboarding trip. It’s light and much more portable. We put our 9 month son in it to play, he leaned against the cross bars, and it badly scratched and bruised his eye and forehead!!! Absolutely terrible. Will be sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Necessity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my twins (3rd & 4th kids) and wish I would have had it since my first. It’s a great size even for two little ones, is simple to setup and knock down, stores small, and is durable. We have used it everywhere—backyard, sporting events, pool, etc. It’s also easy to clean up if they get messy with snacks and we throw a blanket in the bottom of it if it’s on a hard surface. They are 16 months now-there is still enough room for both and they have yet to be able to knock it over by pushing or attempting to climb. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mama of 4

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!! I use it at the beach since my son is 18 months (one and a half y/o) and runs like crazy. It's easy to carry and easy to clean the sand out of. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Ours Broke Very Quickly
customer_reviews.text: We used the canopy about five times before it broke. The "ribs" are made of very thin plastic and one broke in half, rendering the whole thing useless. I need to contact Amazon to see about a replacement. Also, not a huge deal, but it's advertised as easily slipping into the carrying bag that the play yard is stored in. I wouldn't call it easy unless you enjoy sticking your arm way down to the bottom of the bag to push the play yard aside and then carefully maneuvering the canopy past it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Butsch Petit

customer_reviews.title: Great ‘baby jail’
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to help keep our then 8 month old grandson contained a bit. We nicknamed it ‘baby jail’. (No judgement needed, we think it’s funny) It’s large enough so that an adult can sit in there and play with him, which is more frequently than not. Super easy to set up and take down. The bottom isn’t cushioned at all so it needs to sit on a mat or rug vs the hard floor. We knew that going in so we were not disappointed. Wouldn’t hesitate recommending to others.
customer_reviews.author: Julie L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Play Yard for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my 9 month old. We opened package and it opened and we moved fabric to lock into place. It took less than 5 minutes to put it together and close it up. We did not purchase the canopy but used a stand alone table umbrella and it worked great. We were also able to turn it upside down and created a barrier to keep child shaded and protected, if wanted to see it that way too. We would definitely buy again and will recommend the product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect play pen for the beach. I also got the summer infant sum shade. My 3month was able to enjoy the warm spring breeze while be shaded from the Hot Hawaiian sun. It was super easy to pop up and take down... we had some light winds and the pop n play didn't sway. Also the play pen was large enough for me to sit in with my son and his bouncy child.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our twins when they were babies, and used it daily for two years. Despite frequent use, it held up wonderfully -- no rips or tears anywhere. The play yard was easy to set up and fold back up. It took very little room when folded, making it perfect for traveling. It was big enough for two toddlers and their toys, with room to move around. YMMV, but they tried to climb out only once, fell, and never tried again, allowing us to use this until they were over age 2. The only problem is cleaning the floor of it, since it doesn't come off, so it does have some stains. Overall, however, I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: blakdove

customer_reviews.title: Meh... basic...
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept and we use ours frequently when we got to the lake, so I have no issue there. I gave it 4 stars because I wish it had more features/bells and whistles. It may seem silly, but after reviewing other options out there, this one is basic and slightly lacking. The base isn't waterproof and none of the canopy options you have to purchase separately are bug proof. It's just a little disappointing compared to other options out there.
customer_reviews.author: NickyH

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This was much easier to set up then I expected after reading some of the other reviews. Just unfold and put the pull tab to move the final straps into position it wasn't hard at all. 9 month old loves it. I did add foam tile in the bottom like others suggested as I have it on a wooden floor and he is learning to stand and trying to walk leading to some falls. If I use it much I will put pipe insulation over the cross bars to prevent any hard bumps. Seems to be a very nice product and I will update if I have any issues
customer_reviews.author: Nio

customer_reviews.title: Egh.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item specifically for a trip so that my 9 month old could stretch out in her own space. Unfortunately when I opened it, it was broken. I was not able to use this but I can say that it is lightweight for sure. I can see how the other reviewers were concerned about their baby’s hitting the bars. That would definitely be an issue for me. I have started my return and although I have amazon prime I am being charged to send this broken product back. As in I pay for the return of a product that arrived broken. So that’s my 2 cents on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Doejah

customer_reviews.title: excellent and life changing
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad these are coming back into style. They're essential for safety and peace of mind instead of the popular way of following your 1-year-old around or not, and letting them (somewhat safely) drag everything out of every drawer and cabinet. I like how easy it is to fold up and carry to our family tennis lessons, and that we can use it outdoors and indoors. It's also not too small, not too lightweight (no collapsing), and is quite durable. It's a smart design and I recommend it as a mom of five.
customer_reviews.author: PieAndPoirot

customer_reviews.title: Great product if your baby will allow it
customer_reviews.text: This baby jail is top notch. It's light weight, easy to fold out or back in, easily to store, easy to tote. But my baby HATED it. Best intentions, am I right? I mean, he wouldn't stop crying till I pulled him out. So much for all my yard work plans. We kept it though, because it's more convenient than a pack and play. We bought a blow up mattress insert and we use it for sleeping at other peoples houses like a portable crib. So not a total fail. For other less boisterous children that don't mind baby jails, I think these are some of the best in terms of value, portability and storage when not using.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for multiple babies
customer_reviews.text: We are in love with this "pop n' play." It's perfect for outdoor use, like at the park. Also works great to take along on trips. It's very lightweight and easy to set up and pack away. We also got the canopy too! There are some others that are way more expensive, and I can't compare those items to this one, but this one definitely fits our needs and budget. With triplets, this comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoning...

customer_reviews.title: Must have baby item.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my go to gifts for anyone having a baby. Lifesaver for once your baby starts crawling. Bigger than a regular playpen so they don't feel so confined and you can put bigger toys inside to keep them busy. Folds up super easy and compact. Great for outdoors as well. To clean I just took it outside and sprayed it down with a hose and let it dry in the sun. You can also get a little rug to fit the inside to make it softer and easier to clean as well. Overall great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Van-Y

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to Pop n Play, doesn't fall off
customer_reviews.text: I have to write a review because there are so many negative reviews on the HALF canopy. This is the full canopy and works great! It attaches all the way around the Pop n Play and hasn't blown off yet. Plenty of shade to protect my baby's skin. Love it! Easy to collapse and also to put on--just snaps right onto the Pop n Play frame. Get this!
customer_reviews.author: JenBarTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great play yard
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this for my one year-old grandson as a safe alternative when I am busy in the same room. It's a great size and also folds down very easily. It comes with a carrying case that you can use to hang it to store. I also purchased a separate pad to go on the bottom since it has only a very thin plastic bottom and I was using it inside on wood floors. That did the trick to make it more comfortable for the baby. It will also Be good for bringing outside in the yard when needed
customer_reviews.author: volunteer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, collapses quick and stores inside the bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a little expensive for the price, but is well made and stores easily inside the bag. The quality is great, and I can see it lasting a long time. We use this inside and outside to keep our little one safe while working in the yard or cleaning and it holds up well. The top provides full coverage from sun which is great so you don’t have to put sunscreen on! It stores in the bag for the main play yard and snaps on super quick.
customer_reviews.author: clsteldt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent larger play yard
customer_reviews.text: After years of using a different portable play yard for my older child, I finally bought this one for my youngest and I really wish I had done it sooner! This is by far, the best on the market. It's very easy to set up and break down and offers kids so much more space to move around and play. Even better, it's made by a great company that really stands behind it's products. Just a few months after purchasing this one, one of the seams started coming loose, making the play yard a bit less secure. I called Summer, explained the problem and they exchanged the product for a new one right away.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other playpen!
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt the best play pen ever! It's so easy to fold up and take along on the go. Fairly easy to clean. I did add the foam insulation on the bars for added protection against head bumps and a super soft rug in the same shape on the bottom for padding!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great, until they learn to climb out
customer_reviews.text: The item is great, not too small, and very portable, until your toddler figures out a way to climb out... My daughter is very curious, loves to grab everything in sight, and this serves its purpose when we are cleaning etc... unfortunately she now climbs out shortly after we place her inside, she's not even two yet, so need to find another product.
customer_reviews.author: edyuani montes huerta

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s sort of hard to attach until you get used to it. But it really doesn’t do much to keep the sun off my baby - except at 11am or 2pm. The angle of the sun has to be just right, or the sun gets them through the walls of the play yard or from directly above since this only covers half from above. I got it on Amazon Warehouse deal, so for what I paid, it’s fine. But I wouldn’t pay full price for it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be a bit safer
customer_reviews.text: This is super helpful when I need to put my little down so I can vacuum but I definitely have my issues with it. It's not very safe for babies that are starting to pull up and stand. The "X" on the sides are very hard and baby can hit his head on it if he falls. My done has cut his lip and face on it a few times. So we are going to only use it once he has the hand of standing and walking without falling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should of bought early on.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a breeze! Easy to pack, assemble and carry. Originally bought to use outdoor but decided to keep it open at home and it was a great idea! Bigger kids climb in and out to play with the baby. Now that the baby is 18mth there is the attempt to climb out, so far she’s scared to complete the attempt and I discourage her when she does it. All in all, a great purchase for the family and like the versatility to carry and quickly set up anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Elena S.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best baby purchases we've made so far
customer_reviews.text: One of the best baby purchases we've made so far. It requires no assembly whatsoever...comes in a box, folded up in a bag, and when you remove it from the bag you just pull the poles apart to set it up. Seriously could not be easier. We got this to use in our new RV but have been using it at home and in the yard too because it's so great. Nice and sturdy so I'm not worried about my son (10 months old, 24 pounds/29 inches, pulling himself up on everything but not overly balanced just yet) knocking it over at all. Highly recommend and probably will be buying as baby shower gifts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: LTTaniguchiTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect playard situation
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver when you have 2 young kids. Especially when one isnt able to walk yet. It kept my younger away from my very active toddlef and they could still interact together. It made doing chores less stressful when not having your full undivided attention to the kiddos. I shouldve gotten this for my first. It is also convenient and slim enough to put in the trunk and go visit family without having my kids tear appart their living room. 😅
customer_reviews.author: Realtra Dark

customer_reviews.title: Must have for first year survival!
customer_reviews.text: Love love Love this play pen. Night thinks when daughter was 8 months old and starting to walk. Large enough that it allows her freedom, but keeps her safe and allows me to get things done..she's one now and walks, things, and climbs on everything. We have to be careful of what toys we keep inside this now to prevent her from trying to get out, but still use it daily. Easy to clean, easy to put up and take down, very portable. Honestly, one of the very few items that I would consider "must have," for the first year!
customer_reviews.author: E. Briner

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a beach chair for baby’s
customer_reviews.text: I originally chose another on Walmart website but by the time I clicked purchase it was gone so I googled around & compared, decided to go with this one. Don’t really know what I expected, it’s my 9 month olds first day in it so I guess I will wait to see how she likes it. As for now it’s kind of a beach chair material play tent, somewhat sturdy. A bit overpriced for the product material (but that’s just my opinion)
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and easy to set up and take down!!
customer_reviews.text: followed a couple of the viewers advice and I bought the padded puzzle like play mats at first to put on the bottom of the play yard but instead used some of those squares to put in front of the metal rods to keep my grandson from hitting his head and on the top rods I went to Home Depot and purchased some already slit pipe foam covers and they worked well At one point in time I had my mother - 2 nine-month-olds- a three-year-old and a five-year-old and my 11-year-old niece all in the play yard together!! Very spacious!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariapal7

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't gone to beach without it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to the Pop N' Play Yard! Purchased it so we could use it on our beach vacation, it worked beautifully! Provided full shade and withstood high winds! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Hill

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product- I just ordered a second
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product- I just ordered a second! We keep one for outdoor use- bringing our 15 month old to the beach, or having her play outside while we do yard work. I just purchased a second to keep for indoor use- our own home, as well as traveling to other's homes. We also purchased the sunshade, which is ok, but would be much better if it covered the entire playard like a tent. Overall, a great product- I just wish they sold it in a different color combination!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t provide much shade
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use, however unless it is high noon it does not provide much shade because the sun comes into the play yard from the sides and under the arched part of the canopy. We end up draping towels or sheets over the side to make shade. If you’re purchasing to use outdoors where there is little shade you would be better off with a beach tent that has a closed side. We love the play yard that this attaches to, but the canopy is just about pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: So easy and wonderful
customer_reviews.text: So extremely easy to attach to the playyard and also easy to store with playyard! I have yet to use this outdoors so if anything negative arises, I will be sure to update my review, but honestly it's just perfect so I don't see that happening.
customer_reviews.author: KristalG

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it, Nana does too
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, easy to put out and put up. We really do love it. I give it 4 stars due to the bottom material. Made out of tough plastic, you still need to insure that there's nothing below that could pierce or potentially create a hole. When we used outside, we ended up putting a heavy blanket underneath. This not only created a barrier, it also made it softer. There is NO padding, it's just a plastic "mat". I would recommend putting something under if on any type of hard surface or outside where something could puncture.
customer_reviews.author: C Koehn

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS AND DO YOURSELF A FAVOR❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this pack and play it's amazing!!! It's spacious for my one year old to have his freedom and it so stinkin easy to fold up and take anywhere. I HATE the other ones that I have to fight with to open and pull here and click there this is as easy as opening a lawn chair! I have a two and a half yr old and a one yr old and they BOTH love playing in it because it doesn't feel like a pack and play
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Metal brackets are unsafe for baby’s face
customer_reviews.text: The brackets used to secure the bars to the mesh fabric are NOT soft. This is problematic since my daughter seems land, face first, right into these brackets - on the inside of the play yard. There is no padding or protection from the brackets on the inside of the play yard aside from the mesh. And how well does mesh protect a busy infant’s face from smacking into a metal bracket??
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the play yard
customer_reviews.text: We put this on top of the Summer Infant Play yard and it makes for a great way to keep my baby in the shade. We have been using this in the yard for over a year with no issues. I originally bought it for the beach, but this does not do well with high winds. It does however work great in our yard, which gets some wind, but not the big gusts that you would get at the beach. It is easy to pop on and off and I really like that you can adjust the shade and coolness by zipping up or unzipping the sides.
customer_reviews.author: XFitLauren

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: We love this! We use this when traveling to hotels. It’s a dedicated “play area” in the room while the pack n play is a dedicated sleep area. It’s large enough my daughter doesn’t feel confined. Have used at grandmas house too and my daughter crawls to it and asks to go in. For outdoors, put a blanket on the ground and turn it upside down to prevent sun exposure. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Salrin

customer_reviews.title: This is really easy to put on the top of the pop n ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really easy to put on the top of the pop n play pen. It leaves enough room for a breeze, but offers great sun protection. I is very secure and won't blow off in a breeze. Easy enough for one, non-handy type mom lie me to install in about 30 seconds. Really happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dimitriu

customer_reviews.title: Fast setup, lightweight, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: sturdy, easy to set up and move around a room. Helpful finger holds are on the straps that are used to keep the pen open and locked into place. The only improvement would be a waterproof floor, as a spill of liquid in the pen leaks through to the floor unnderneath which means you have to turn the pen over to clean the underside of the pen and also the floor under it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this playard for my 11 month daughter. I love that it has it's own carrying case, make it easy to tote around. There is plenty of space in the playard for toys and a couple kids. You can easily see through the mesh. The walls are plenty high I don't have to worry about her trying to climb out. Set up is really simple, it has straps that you pull over each foot that lock it into place. I have the whole thing ready to go in under 2 minutes. I also like that the straps have loops so you have the option to stake it down when you're outside.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this!! So much better than a pack n play. My son is above the 99th percentile in height and weight (at 14 months he is 35 lbs and 36 inches) and we struggle to find items that will work with his large stature. We were concerned this would tip or would not be roomy enough. Wrong on both counts. My son leans on the sides and it does not give at all and he has plenty of room to have toys and other comfort items with him and still allow for freedom of movement. This is a great find and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Bridgman

customer_reviews.title: Oh yes!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE! I bought this for my two three-week old ducklings to run around in. I can sit inside with them! The playpen itself seems to be very well made. It was simple and easy to set up, taking less than five minutes to open the box and get it ready for the ducks. Once the playpen is set up, the mesh on the sides is stretched tight, which is great! The bottom isn't very thick, however, so babies would most likely need an additional mat or blanket to lie on. Overall, I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: playpen for my pup
customer_reviews.text: I got this when I went on vacation and brought my little chihuahua. I did a ton of research on playpens and landed on this one- this one is much better than the ones designed for dogs. I opted for this design rather than a pop-up playpen as I read those sometimes collapse. This was easy to set up and was the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: sof

customer_reviews.title: Trust me. You need this.
customer_reviews.text: The people at summer infant are brilliant. You know when you say “why didn’t I think of that!?” Because we’re just not smart enough. Easy to use. Durable. Easy to pack. Arguably the best $50 I ever spent. My 18 month old actually loves his “playtime” while mommy gets ready for work. I wish I had it for my first and recommend all of their products it to anyone willing to listen.
customer_reviews.author: MommyMayhem

customer_reviews.title: Its ok but had to improve
customer_reviews.text: Very good product except one thing the bars and my childs head connect all the time so i put some pipe insulation around each bar about 15 bucks extra its great now but i had to spend an extra 15 bucks and to transport now is harder but possible and we had to put our own padding in
customer_reviews.author: VitoWolverine

customer_reviews.title: My daughter banged her head pretty badly on the metal within 5 minutes of us ...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this piece. In order for it to work for our family, I would have had to cover each metal piece with a pool noodle, as others have done, and put padding down on the bottom (which is explicitly says NOT to do in the manual). My daughter banged her head pretty badly on the metal within 5 minutes of us owning this. It does set up rather easily though.
customer_reviews.author: Girl in Japan

customer_reviews.title: metal bars not safe
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is big but the exposed metal bars are really not safe for my 8 month old baby. I saw the reviews suggesting putting pool noodles around them but that defeats the purpose of it being portable. He has hit his head 3 times already and cries about being in it. For some reason he prefers his graco playpen even though it is smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Just a customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not durable like I would like it to be.
customer_reviews.text: I have a love hate relationship with this playpen. It has gotten flimsy and doesn’t tighten as well. It can literally fold a certain way up next to my bed to where it goes into this odd straight side on one side. Kinda convenient but not so safe. My baby has fund a way to almost tip it once. I loved it for the first few weeks though. Just wish it would’ve stayed durable.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Revels

customer_reviews.title: A NEED NOT LUXURY.  U NEED THIS.
customer_reviews.text: This saved me . I also upgraded with pool noodles zip ties them and foam in the bottom and my daughter was able to practice standing she was walking in no time. It's a safe place when I can watch my baby while I cook , clean or even have her watch a show and I was able to do a quick shower. I love this so much because it really helped me multitask.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport and setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry and easy to attach to the Summer Infant Play area. We have already used this so much this summer which allows our son to play independently outside and not get burned by the sun. One thing to note, unless the sun is directly overhead this will not block the sun completely. Since the play area is made of mesh, you will still get sunlight in through the sides. However, it adds another layer of sun protection during the middle of the day!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Easy to use and pack back up!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure I’d like this playpen but it is the easiest lightest play area I’ve ever assembled. Our 8 month old granddaughter is a fast crawler and I wasn’t sure she’d want to stay inside but she actually liked it and played with her little toys and enjoyed it. My daughter plans to take it with them on a trip to use as a portable bed area. It folds up as easy as it opens. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Aseretk

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use play pen
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 9 month old to use outside while in the garden. I have no complaints, as it does exactly what it should. It folds/unfolds like a lawn chair would with a cover sleeve. The bottom piece of fabrics seems to be durable, but we’ve also only had it a month. It came in a timely fashion, and not damaged. I would recommend this product to anyone needing help containing your moving youngster, while still giving the freedom to move around!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Heisler

customer_reviews.title: Fast easy set up and take down!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how I survived outside time without this players with my older children. It’s been a game changer since we’ve purchased it. Quick, easy set up and in seconds I’ve got a safe space for the little one. Really nice big area for my child to play and explore in while enjoying the outdoors. It’s also super easy and quick to breakdown when we are finished.
customer_reviews.author: Aczachur

customer_reviews.title: best play pen ive seen even for climbers
customer_reviews.text: this works perfect even for those kids that like to climb very easy to clean stays in place and doesnt have issues with tipping over i would suggest putting in a mat or blanket at the bottom to make it comfy and it folds up easy when the straps at the bottom arent in place very good quality worth the price accidentally ordered 2 of them and love the first one so much that i gave the other to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Frost410

customer_reviews.title: Great size and portable
customer_reviews.text: I find the size of this item to be very appropriate for one child. As an added bonus my 1 year old son and his friend walk around the outer perimeter of this playard and chase each other using it as support. It's very easy to set up and take down and I do it daily at home and I like to put away all the kid's stuff at the end of the day so our place can be tidy for a moment. I'm very happy there's no chemical smells as that was a common complaint for the plastic type playards.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this play yard!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this product! It is exactly as advertised, in that it really does set up and take down in seconds. So far we have used it at home, on the beach, at the park, and at a friend’s home when needing to provide a safe place for our 7-month-old to crawl around. It’s great for him to burn off some energy while traveling, and so easy to take along because it folds so compactly and takes up little space in the car. Buy this play yard! It’s the best!
customer_reviews.author: LeaH1109

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a sturdy play yard. We got this because our 9 month old is strong and we saw in review videos the one we were thing about 8pannel play yard in tan was being pushed around by a toddler. So we went with this one and we r thrilled! He is a happy lil guy and we can watch him or even go in there with him. There is that much room. 14 sq inches. It's not as much room as the panneled onw 32 sq inches but so far it feels worth it knowing it won't fall on him.
customer_reviews.author: Matt or Lindz

customer_reviews.title: Great kiddie corral!
customer_reviews.text: We use this as our baby’s play yard in our home. We’ve traveled with it across country in our car and it was wonderful to have a safe place for the kiddo no matter where we were. When it gets dirty we just spray it with cleaner and hose it off. It dries pretty fast (especially in the sun). Any spills are easy to wipe up. Spot cleaning can also be done quickly. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver so far!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes, this is the only way we can do simple things like go to the bathroom or switch out the laundry. Life saver! It's very sturdy and our large (26-lb) 10MO would never be able to tip it over, even standing and leaning against the mesh walls, which he does frequently. Set up was easy. We haven't had to break it down or move it yet, but it seems very transportable. Have had it for a few months now. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Easy Open and Close. Nice Appearance
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a small, older dog who has just recently gone blind, eyes were removed due to disease. We can set it up on the deck when we are outside for her to be with us. It is very easy to open and close and stores compactly. Wish the bottom vinyl were thicker, it is very thin and I am waiting to see how long it will last. Not due to wear from the dog, but, just the normal decomposition of plastic. We always cover the bottom with blankets when in use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cox

customer_reviews.title: I'm 50/50 on this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I like how big it is. However I hate how you have to crawl around the bottom and connect all the piecesto "lock" it down every single time. If I had to do it over I would pick the more expensive one that seemed a LOT nicer. Over all its just ok. Would I recommend? Maybe for a family who is in sports and needs one for occasional use outdoors. But its not great for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this play pen! My son is 16 months old and walking everywhere so I take this with me to my job! And surprisingly it’s lighter than the traditional play pen. There’s no padding in the floor like your typical play pen BUT I just lay down a thick blanket and pillow for nap time. And there’s so much room that my 4 year old and 6 year old can play with their brother! HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about it except..
customer_reviews.text: I really love this, but my only problem I had was that my 18 Months old baby can climb out of it because of the X shapes around the playard. She's able to stand in the middle of the X. Luckily our floors are carpet, so even if she falls over, she wouldn't hurt as bad. It's really nice though like when you have lots of unsafe items around the house and you don't want your baby going near it, this is a plus! It was very easy to fold and put it somewhere in the corner. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: vampvivid

customer_reviews.title: I find it is easy to pop up and take down
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy thing to have on hand. I find it is easy to pop up and take down. My daughter in law leaves hers up but I take mine up and down for our grand-daughter. I do put a folded quilt under the base because I am putting on hard wood floors. She pulls up and walks around holding the edges and it has not been a problem. She can see us so she does not feel isolated and I can go to the bathroom or prepare a meal without worrying about her falling into furniture or the hearth. We plan to also take this to the beach for inside & possibly outside use.
customer_reviews.author: Monty Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It is perfect in my living room to keep my little guy contained. As a single parent with dogs in the house, sometimes I just need a safe place that's not a crib. It's rather spacious but not too big for my 1K sq ft house. I've only moved it once, but it was very easy to disassemble and reassemble. Seems pretty sturdy. I can use it to pull myself up if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chrysalis

customer_reviews.title: Best alternative
customer_reviews.text: Bought two plastic play yards because I was concerned about he limited space of this transportable one. The other play yards are too bulky and, although they fold, take up a lot of space when not in use. This transportable play yard is much better! It has an adequate amount of space for kids, has very clear lines of sight for parents and is easily collapsible so that it can be stored out of the way and in the closet. Wish I saved my money and bought this first before buying the other two play yards
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: It opens easily, but I notice a safety issue for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Playard for my granddaughter. It opens easily, but I notice a safety issue for my one year old. The metal poles are bare and not covered/cushioned with anything. She is at the stage where she stills looses her balance and falls. I'm afraid she could hit her head on them. Also, the bottom needs a large cushion for hard floors. I think one is sold separately? I decided this Playard is not safe and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: TE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVVVVE!!! so easy to assemble and disassembled. Lightweight and easy to pack around. Big enough for kids to actually play! At one point my 7yr old daughter, 5yr old niece, 1.5yr old niece and 1yr old son were ALL in there playing! I bought the full canopy separately and highly recommend it as well! It fits inside the playpen when folded up so it is all together in ge carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Great Play Space!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this tent! Super helpful in keeping my 11 month old contained! Fits lots of toys in there with still plenty of room to move around. Easy to put up and easy to fold. Takes up a good amount of our living room because the size is great! Can’t wait to try it at the beach this summer!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for moms!
customer_reviews.text: I cant say enough about this. It exceeded my expectations. It fits perfectly in my living room when I want my son to play safely while I get work done. Opening and putting it away is super easy! I take it with me to my older sons games and to visit relatives. Its light weight, ready to go out of the bag. Don't hesitate to buy this. My son has had it for the past 2 months, he will be 10 months old next week. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Trish B

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for camping to keep my newly walking little one in. I tried to find cheaper brands and all that but then just bought this and im so so glad I did. I can open it with one hand, baby on my hip and I can close it with one hand. All you you need is this and a small basket of toys!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Koschara

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice play yard. I was excited when I got it and opened it right away. It’s built well, portable, not too heavy, bright and cheery bright green. It’s large. What I thought would fit in my living room didn’t. The only problem with this is my own living room.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: This is very easy to use and light
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use and light. Much easier to use than a pack n play if you are looking for something to have your baby play in. We have brought it to the beach, in hotels and use it everywhere in the house. The only thing I wish, is that the bottom had some cushioning. I know you can buy a mat, but it is more than the playpen itself and isn't as easy to transport. But I just put a blanket down and it's fine. Overall happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: KgMack

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I drag this thing all over our yard. I have an almost 3 yr old, 15 month old, and 2 month old. We enjoy going outside, but my 15 month old goes and explores EVERYWHERE. We have an acre of yard surrounded by woods.. so he is gone in the flash of an eye. This helps contain him when I actually need to get something done outside or feed the baby. It’s a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks really great. Love the color and the structure. Fits our small apartment. With the mesh,it doesn't look like it is taking much space. Very easy to set up. Mama really loves it! Baby loves it also. Easy fold and light enough to carry around. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jolieorange

customer_reviews.title: perfect for crawlers
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfect for my kids at the beach, in the living room, outside in the yard, and in my bathroom while I showered. It is more than big enough to make a great play area for the kids and keep them safe while you are cooking, cleaning, showering...Packs up super easy like a camping chair bag. Love it. totally worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Best play pen for outdoors and on the go! LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect outdoor necessity for us with our twins!! We use this at home on the porch, at the park and the ball field when our oldest child has a practice or a game. So easy to set up and pack up too! We have also used indoors. It's so much easier to set up than a typical play pen. We added the sun shade that fits on top and LOVE that as well. It fits right inside the play pen when folding it up and putting it away in the carry bag. Easy to tote around with the shoulder strap too!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so my child can sit in it with our pet while I work nearby. Serves its purpose well and folds easily and stored inside the bag in a small space. I’m happy with the purchase. The netting may not be strong enough if you have a young child who will grab at it though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer J Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good for rollers and crawlers.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 8 month old. He recently learned to crawl and we put him in here when we are getting ready for work in the morning. This isn't a forever solution, and he doesn't always love it, but it keeps him safe. We like that it is easy to take down and move. We're going on a vacation in a month, and we're looking forward to putting it up in our hotel room, which won't be as baby-proof as our home. I expect that soon he will be throwing things over the sides.
customer_reviews.author: KLWare

customer_reviews.title: Very large
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my grandson n it is ideal for him. The pen is durable and light weight, easy to transport and not clean up required. It comes in a travel bag that goes over your shoulder. We've used it at the beach as well as overnight stays in hotels. I purchased swim noodles and cut to length to insulate the cross bars from the baby. I spent about 12 bucks on the noodles but it was worth it and easy to cut with a knife.
customer_reviews.author: eightoff

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and works great to take the boys to my daughters ball game!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to be able to take my twin boys to my daughters softball game. Works great! Easy set up! Lightweight. The only flaw that I could see is: the bottom of the playard is not a thick material, so if you set this on concrete the baby does not have much cushion to crawl around on (we solved this by putting a quilt in the bottom of the playard). Several compliments from other parents saying that they wished they had one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Better than the half shade
customer_reviews.text: Definitely covers more than the half shade. Sun still shines through at the edges meaning we have to monitor the sun time for our infant/toddler. Other than that, works good!
customer_reviews.author: Gentlebusinessmansir

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Gives my 1 year old a better amount of space to play without getting into everything. The "top rail" is soft nylon webbing but is sturdy enough for him to pull up on and walk around. The external bars can be easily padded if need be. The material it is made of is easier to clean than a regular style pack-n-play and doesn't retain dirt or slobber or any other wonderful baby scents. As someone else said, if you want to pad the bottom, the easiest way would be to use puzzle mats. Great product with easy upgrades if needed.
customer_reviews.author: DM467

customer_reviews.title: A baby must!
customer_reviews.text: The is a baby must! We bought it for our one year old to keep at our marina. It sets up very quickly and can fold up easily as well. It’s a large size and she has plenty of room to move, much larger and lighter than her pack and play. We put a comforter in the bottom for a little cushioning. We now bring it wherever we go because of its ease and convenience.
customer_reviews.author: ktbarc

customer_reviews.title: 6 panel will not work with 8 panel pen.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have the 6 panel vs the 8 panel play pen or this won't work. Unfortunately, this was an add on option for the play pen that was 8 panels, so I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Short

customer_reviews.title: Not the color advertised -
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 4 stars but it is not the color in the picture. The picture shows light gray and this is dark. When you are outside and there’s sun, hence buying this for shade, you do NOT want a dark cover that holds heat! I will probably have to put a light color or white sheet over top.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.  Portability a plus.  Easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Bought after returning the multi color plastic hexagon fence. That thing was too big and bulky and not easy to move around. It was too big for my limited space. This unit is great. Opens really easy like a camping chair. Locks in by pulling the 6 straps. I like that it has a bottom so she's not directly on the ground. Portability added bonus. Was thinking I'd need it while cooking them I'd put it away afterwards... But it's the perfect size I can probably just leave it up and save the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Skynet131

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever got my dogs...
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect pen for smaller dogs. It has a waterproof bottom. It takes less than 3 minutes to set it up. And its roomy enough for three dogs, their bed, a pee pad area and a water bowl area. Its sturdy and folds easily. Great price. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Paulaer Amateur Editor

customer_reviews.title: Small downside, good product.
customer_reviews.text: Only downside is the straps on the corner pieces have to be pulled under the metal on the outside to secure it which is a little hard to pull on and off hence 4 stars, we also took other reviewers advice and used foam noodles to pad the bars which we have to remove and reinstall everytime we take it anywhere. Same with the foam we use in the bottom... Other than that, awesome product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Fam Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a one-month trip abroad, when I knew my son wouldn't be able to crawl all over the house as normal. It worked great. I piggy-backed it to the umbrella stroller in checked baggage (I don't think the airline even noticed), and it was tremendously easy to set up, use, & clean. I've only used it on a level surface, indoors, but would imagine it would work great outdoors as well. There was enough room for me to get in & play with my son, so I think it could comfortably hold 3-4 toddlers or about 6 babies.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Playpen
customer_reviews.text: I love this playpen. I got it for my two Border Collie puppies, because I wanted them to be screened in, as opposed to fenced in. It is super easy to pop up. The straps that stretch over the feet, to tighten the sides, are heavy duty and have great stitching. And, the screens, that make up the sides, are also good quality. The puppy teeth and claws have not even been able to snag the screens. I would absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy E.

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use play yard
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this play yard for both inside and outside. If I need to do laundry or clean a different room, I assemble this play yard so my son can't hurt himself. I wish it was a little bigger, for when he grows there isn't going to be much room for him to move around. I also purchased a set of 200 ball pit balls, to make it a ball pit for fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lizz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing! I don't know why we waited so long to buy but it's a life saver anywhere we go. We have a 24 month old and whenever we need a bed, or safe play area for her, it's always easily available in the trunk of our car. It stores just like a folding lounge chair. Doesn't take up much space but is larger than a bulky play pen which costs double the money. Would reccomend to anyone with babies or toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria D.

customer_reviews.title: Great playard, exactly what you want!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME! It was purchased for an 8 month old who's grandma won't baby proof. This is the perfect size. It's big enough to play and move around in, but doesn't take a huge amount of space! I love that it has a bottom on it. You don't have to worry about spills or what is on the ground. It also packs up very easily and is light and easy to move. You could use this in the house, in the yard, you could probably even take it to the beach or camping. This was a great purchase! My 4 year old even climbed in and out and it held up to her abuse!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Thielman

product_meta.title: Summer Pop ‘n Play Portable Playard, Green – Lightweight Play Pen for Indoor and Outdoor Use – Portable Playard with Fast, Easy and Compact Fold
product_meta.description:
Color:GreenThe Summer Pop ‘n Play Portable Playard allows you to easily create a safe portable play area for your child. The ultra-lightweight and compact fold playpen can be set up and taken down in seconds, making it perfect for use at home, a day at the park, or a weekend at the beach. The water resistant floor helps keep baby dry even on damp grass. Airy mesh sides provide added visibility. A travel bag with shoulder strap is included for on-the-go convenience.

BRAND STORY
By Summer Infant

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
1-800-2668-6237.

See more
feature_bullets: INDOOR/OUTDOOR USE – Whether playtime is indoors or out, keeping your little one in one place is essential! The Summer Pop ‘n Play Portable Play Yard provides 14 square feet of contained playing area, and the folding metal frame weighs only 12lbs.
LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE – The ultra-lightweight and compact play yard for baby and toddler is perfect for use at home inside or out, a day at the park or even a vacation at the beach.

COMPACT FOLD – With a lightweight, innovative pop and fold design that sets up and comes down in seconds, plus an easy and compact fold, you can have a travel toddler and space saver baby playpen to bring with you on all your adventures.
WATER RESISTANT FLOOR – Playpens for babies can easily become messy, but not the Pop ‘n Play! The water resistant canvas floor helps keep baby dry, even on damp grass.
ADDITIONAL FEATURES – 14 square feet of playing area (48 inches wide, 26 inches tall), compact fold and travel bag with strap for easy portability included. For use for 6-24 months (up to 35” tall).
